2.name: Paradise Amaryllis
2.description: "When you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss also gazes into you." Commander, please do not forget that when you gaze at Akagi~ *giggles*

3.name: Plum and Snow
3.description: Commander will always remain by Akagi's side... right, "Gods?" Of course... Akagi will deal with these pests... Ahaha...

4.name: Deep Crimson Poppy
4.description: We should send out even more invites... This is the best way to rid ourselves of those pesky vixens all at once!

limitBreak.tier1: Number of Torpedo Bombers +1 / All Plane Efficiency +3%
limitBreak.tier2: Hangar Capacity +1 / Number of Fighters +1 / All Plane Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier3: Number of All Planes +1 / All Plane Efficiency +7%

1.name: Preemptive Victory
1.description: At the beginning of combat, reduces the charge time of own first airstrike by 20% (50%).

2.name: Ikkousen
2.description: When paired with Kaga or Kaga (Battleship) in the same fleet, increases own Air Power by 15% (35%).

2.chinese: 我是光荣的一航战，人称无敌舰队的赤城。只要和我引以为傲的载航机还有指挥官一起，无论是什么样的战局都能跨越。呵呵呵，是的，只要是和指挥官一起……
2.chineseTL: I am Akagi of the glorious 1st Carrier Division, the fleet known to have no equal.As long as I have this aircraft that gives me great pride and Commander, there is no obstacle on the battlefield that I cannot overcome. Heheheh... indeed, as long as I am with Commander..
2.japanese: 栄光なる一航戦、無敵艨艟(もうどう)と讃えられる艦隊の赤城と申します。自慢の艦載機、そして指揮官様と一緒ならどんな戦局でも乗り越えてみせますわ。うふふ、はい、指揮官様と一緒なら…
2.japaneseTL: I am Akagi of the peerless and glorious 1st Carrier Division.I will overcome any battle with my famed air wing together you, Commander.(Giggles) Yes, so long as I'm with together with you…

3.chinese: 终于遇到你了，指挥官，不过…看来碍眼的家伙有点多呢，先让我“扫除”一下，再来进行爱的交流吧，呵呵呵~
3.chineseTL: We finally meet, Commander. However, there appear to be too many eyesores here. Please allow me to "clean up" a bit before we advance our relationship. Hehehe~
3.japanese: ようやく会えたね指揮官様。でも…目障りなものが結構多いようね…まず「ソウジ」してから、ゆっくりと親睦を深めましょう。ふふふ…
3.japaneseTL: We meet at last, Commander. But… there seems to be quite the number of "eyesores" here… Firstly, some cleaning is in order, then we can take our time to deepen our friendship. (Giggles)

4.chinese: 哎呀，欢迎回来…指挥官再晚点出现，这里就要被我变成一片火海了呢…嘻嘻
4.chineseTL: Ah, welcome back! If Commander appeared just a little later, I would have turned this place into a sea of flames... hehe
4.japanese: あら、おかえり…指揮官様がもう少し遅れてたら、ここを火の海にしたとこですわ…うふふ
4.japaneseTL: Ah, welcome back… Commander, if you'd have arrived just a little later, I would have turned this place into a sea of flames… (Giggles)

5.chinese: 指挥官把赤城当做自己的宝物了吗？好开心
5.chineseTL: Does Commander consider Akagi as his treasure? This delights me.
5.japanese: 指揮官様、この赤城を大切に思っていますか？嬉しいですわ～
5.japaneseTL: Am I close to your heart, Commander? That makes me happy~

6.chinese: 认真工作的指挥官太可爱了，只是看着就整个人像是灼伤一样……
6.chineseTL: The hard-working Commander is too cute. Just looking at you makes me feel like I'm burning up...
6.japanese: 真剣に勤務する指揮官様かわいい。うふふ…見るだけでやけどしそう…
6.japaneseTL: You're so cute when you take your work seriously, Commander. (Giggles) Just watching you makes me feel like I'll overheat…

7.chinese: 不要欺负赤城跑得慢啦……嘿！抓·住·你·了！
7.chineseTL: Do not make fun of me for being slow-footed... ho! C a u g h t y o u!
7.japanese: 赤城の足が遅いのをいじらないこと…ふふ♡ツ・カ・マ・エ・タ♡
7.japaneseTL: Do not make fun of me for being slow-footed… (Giggles) ♡I've-caught-you♡

8.chinese: 这个气味……是那孩子吗……！指挥官，赤城离开一下哟~
8.chineseTL: This smell... is it that child? Commander, Akagi will be right back~
8.japanese: この匂い…あの娘ね…指揮官様、赤城は少々お暇をいただきますわ～♡
8.japaneseTL: This smells like… Her… I'll need to take a break for a little bit, Commander~♡

10.chinese: 指挥官想的话，把姐妹们叫来围观也，行，哦~
10.chineseTL: If Commander wishes, it'd be okay call my sisters to come spectate~
10.japanese: 指揮官様がしたいなら、姉妹たちを呼んでみんなの目の前でしてもいいですよ～
10.japaneseTL: If you wish then you may call for my sisters and do me in front of everyone~

11.chinese: 新的任务……也就是我和指挥官新的羁绊，嘻嘻……
11.chineseTL: A new mission... in other words, a new bond between Commander and me, hehe...
11.japanese: 新しい任務……それはつまり指揮官様とのあたらしい絆…うふふ……
11.japaneseTL: A new mission… In other words, a new bond between me and the commander… (Giggles)

12.chinese: 奖励……不过我只要有和指挥官一起的证明就够了
12.chineseTL: Rewards... Proof of being together with Commander is enough for me.
12.japanese: ご褒美……私は指揮官様と一緒にいるという証だけでいいわ
12.japaneseTL: Rewards… Just the proof that I was together with the commander is enough for me.

13.chinese: 有信件呢……指挥官，是谁啊？说嘛，是谁？是谁？
13.chineseTL: A letter... Excuse me Commander, who is this from? Tell me, who? Who is this?
13.japanese: お手紙ね……ねえ指揮官様、誰からの手紙ですか？ねえ誰？誰からのものなの？
13.japaneseTL: You have a letter… Hey, Commander, who is it from? Who? Whosent this to you?

14.chinese: “命运的五分钟”？是指指挥官和我在一起的每一个五分钟吗？
14.chineseTL: "Five Minutes of Fate?" Is this referring to every five minutes of my time with Commander?
14.japanese: 「運命の五分間」？指揮官様と一緒にいる時間を五分刻みにすることですか？
14.japaneseTL: "Five minutes of fate?" Is that referring to every five minutes of my time with you, Commander?

15.chinese: 虽然希望去委托的家伙们最好不要回来……委托我已经核对过了哦，指挥官看一眼就好了~
15.chineseTL: Although I hoped that they would not return... I have confirmed the completion of the commission. Commander only needs to take a quick glance~
15.japanese: このまま帰ってこなければいいのに……委託は私が確認しておきましたの。指揮官様はぱっと見るだけで大丈夫です～
15.japaneseTL: I was hoping they wouldn't come back… I have confirmed that the commission has been completed. You only need to give it a quick look, Commander~

16.chinese: 啊，指挥官的爱在赤城的胸中沸腾
16.chineseTL: Ah, Commander's love boils within Akagi's chest...
16.japanese: あぁ…指揮官様の愛は赤城の胸の中で滾っていますわ…
16.japaneseTL: Ahh… The commander's love is welling up from within my chest…

17.chinese: 你们也想要接近指挥官吗？！——呵呵呵
17.chineseTL: You also wish to be closer to Commander?! ——Ahahah
17.japanese: あなたたちも指揮官様にお近づきになりたくて？！……あははは！
17.japaneseTL: Are you girls also trying to get close to the commander!? Ahahaha!

18.chinese: 只要是为了指挥官，就算是神，赤城也会赢给你看哦~
18.chineseTL: For Commander's sake, I would even win even against the gods~
18.japanese: 指揮官様のためなら、神ですら凌駕してみせますわ～
18.japaneseTL: I'll surpass even the gods if it's for the commander's sake~

19.chinese: 这点伤，比起想到被指挥官抛弃的痛可要差远了！
19.chineseTL: A wound like this is nothing compared to the thought of being abandoned by Commander.
19.japanese: この程度の傷、指揮官様に見捨てられることと比べるとなんでもありませんわ
19.japaneseTL: These wounds are nothing compared to the pain of being abandoned the commander.

20.chinese: 我的爱也是无敌的哦，啊哈，哈哈哈……
20.chineseTL: My love is also unrivaled, aha, hahaha...
20.japanese: 私の愛は無敵よ！ふふ、ふふふ、ふはははははは！!

21.japanese: うふふふ…盛り上がってきたわ～
21.japaneseTL: Ahaha… Now things are getting exciting~

22.chinese: 只要把指挥官切成几块保存在身边，指挥官就不会老是让赤城伤心了呢……呵呵呵……
22.chineseTL: If I cut Commander up into several pieces to keep by my side, Commander will no longer keep making Akagi feel so sad... hehehe...
22.japanese: 指揮官様をバラバラにしてそばにおいたら、もうこんなに赤城は悲しまないわ……ふふふ…
22.japaneseTL: If I cut you into pieces and keep them beside me, you will no longer cause me so much sadness… (Giggles)

23.chinese: 赤城和指挥官的结合是命中注定哟……从第一眼开始，我就知道指挥官是我要找的那个人了
23.chineseTL: Akagi and Commander were destined to be together... At first sight, I already knew that Commander was the person I've been looking for.
23.japanese: 赤城と指揮官様は結ばれる運命なのよ……ひと目で指揮官様こそ私が探していた方であるとわかりますの
23.japaneseTL: Me and you are destined to be together, Commander… I knew the moment I saw you that you were the person I've been searching for.

24.chinese: 指挥官是我一个人的哦，即使您要管理舰队，只有这一点请不要忘了……不然的话……
24.chineseTL: Commander belongs to me and me alone. This is the one thing you must never forget as you manage this fleet... or else...
24.japanese: 指揮官様は私だけのものですよ。艦隊を管理していてもそれだけを忘れないでほしいですわ……さもないと……
24.japaneseTL: You belong only to me, Commander. That's the one thing I want you to remember as you manage the fleet… And if you don't…

25.chinese: 指挥官，刚才你和其他孩子说话了吧？明明要来见赤城的，为什么要和那孩子搭话呢？是她引诱你的吗？这样的话，就由赤城去把她……
25.chineseTL: Commander, did you just speak to another girl? Why would you speak with her when you were coming to see Akagi? Are they tempting you? In this case, Akagi will...
25.japanese: 指揮官様、今他の子と話しましたよね？赤城に会いに来ているのに、なんで他の子と話すの？誘惑されたの？じゃああんな奴、この赤城が……
25.japaneseTL: You just spoke with some other girl, didn't you, Commander? You came to see me, so why are you talking with other girls? Are you being seduced? Then I'll need to do something about them…

26.chinese: 指挥官~嘻嘻，这样我们就是两个人独处了……指挥官的怀抱，指挥官的笑容，指挥官的气味就全部全部都属于我了……
26.chineseTL: Commander~ hehe, now that the two of us are alone... Commander's embrace, Commander's smile, Commander's scent; all of it, all of it belongs to me...
26.japanese: 指揮官様～ふふふ、これで二人っきり……指揮官様の胸の中、指揮官様の笑顔、指揮官様の匂い、全部全部私のモノなのよ……
26.japaneseTL: Commander~ (Giggles) Now that we're alone… your heart, your smile, your smell, they're all mine, mine alone…

27.chinese: 赤城终于等到了这一天呢，嘻嘻……从现在起，再也没有人能将指挥官和赤城分开了，我的一切都是属于指挥官的，指挥官的一切也是属于我的……呵呵，呵呵呵呵呵呵……
27.chineseTL: Akagi has been waiting for this day, hehe... From now on, no one can separate Commander from me. I belong to Commander, and Commander belongs to me... haha, ahahahaha...
27.japanese: 赤城、この日を待ちわびていましたわ。　ふふふ……これからは誰であろうとも指揮官様と赤城を別れさせられないの。私のすべてが指揮官様のもの、指揮官様のものすべては私のモノよ……ふふ、ふふふ、うふふふふふふ……
27.japaneseTL: I've waited impatiently for this day to come. (Giggles) From now on, nobody, no matter who they are, can separate us. My all belongs to you and your all belongs to me… Aha-ahaha-ahahahahahaha…

28.japanese: （加賀と出撃）指揮官様、私きれい？
28.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Kaga) Commander, am I pretty?

29.chinese: （克利夫兰，内华达，俄克拉荷马，突击者，约克城，企业，兰利，加贺）指挥官，这是对赤城爱的考验吗~？
29.chineseTL: (Cleveland, Nevada, Oklahoma, Ranger, Yorktown , Enterprise, Langley, Kaga) Commander, is this a test of my love?
29.japanese: （クリーブランド、ネバダ、オクラホマ、レンジャー、ヨークタウン、エンタープライズ、ラングレー、加賀の中から任意3キャラと出撃）後ろから撃たれるのに気をつけてちょうだい～！
29.japaneseTL: (Sortie with 3 of any of the following ships: Cleveland, Nevada, Oklahoma, Ranger, Yorktown, Enterprise, Langley, Kaga) I ask of you to be careful not to get shot from behind~!

30.chineseTL: (Enterprise) Be careful that I don't accidentally hurt you~
30.japanese: （エンタープライズと出撃）指揮官様、これは赤城への愛の試練ですか～？
30.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Enterprise) Commander, is this a test of my love for you~?

31.chinese: （俄克拉荷马，天后）我很大度哦，呵呵呵……
31.chineseTL: (Yorktown, Juno) I am very magnanimous, ahaha...
31.japanese: （オクラホマまたはジュノーと出撃）私は寛大ですよ、うふふ…
31.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Oklahoma or Juno) I promise I can be tolerant (Giggles)…

32.chinese: 我知道，指挥官最想要的禮物一定是赤城的吧~ 不过在那之前让赤城先确认一下~ 指挥官收到的，一定只有赤城的祝福吧...?
32.chineseTL: I know, the gift that Commander wants the most must be Akagi's~ But before that, let me just confirm this: Commander, you've only received a gift from me, right?...
32.japanese: 指揮官様が一番欲しいのは、この赤城のプレゼントだと分かりますの〜ですが…その前に確認させてほしいですわ――指揮官様が受け取ったプレゼントは、この赤城のものだけですよね…？
32.japaneseTL: Commander, I know that a present from me is what you want more than anything else~ However, before I give you it, I'd like to confirm something… The only present you've received is from me, correct…?

33.japanese: 指揮官様～赤城、今年もチョコレートを作りましたの。ええ、指揮官様への、誰にも負けない…ううん、きっと誰よりも深い愛を込めていますわ！はい、今食べさせてあげます～あーんして♡

1.chinese: “当你凝视深渊的时候，深渊也在凝视着你”，嘻嘻，指挥官，凝视赤城的时候，不要忘记这句话哦~
1.chineseTL: "When you stare into the abyss, the abyss stares back at you." Hehe, Commander, don't forget these words as you stare at Akagi~
1.japanese: 「深淵をのぞく時、深淵もまたこちらをのぞいている」ーーうふふ、指揮官様、赤城を見つめる時には、くれぐれもこの言葉を忘れないでくださいませ~
1.japaneseTL: "If you gaze long into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you"… (Giggles) Commander, I ask of you to not forget these words when you look at me~

2.chinese: 哎呀，欢迎回来……指挥官之前去哪里了？快脱下衣服让赤城嗅嗅，赤城要闻闻有没有狐狸精的味道呢，嘻嘻…
2.chineseTL: Oh my, welcome back... Where did you go, Commander? Take off your clothes and let Akagi smell you. Akagi wants to check if there's another girl's scent on you, hehe...
2.japanese: あら、おかえり…指揮官様、今までどこにいらしたの？早く上着を脱いで、赤城がほかの子の匂いがついていないか診させてもらいますわ…うふふ……
2.japaneseTL: Ah, welcome back… Where have you been, Commander? Hurry up and take off your coat so that I may determine if it smells like someone else… (Giggles)…

3.chinese: 这是赤城精心挑选的泳装哦~怎么样，指挥官对赤城的爱意变深了吗？
3.chineseTL: Akagi picked this swimsuit after much consideration~ How is it, Commander? Has your love for Akagi deepened?
3.japanese: これは赤城が念入りに選んだ水着ですわ。指揮官様、どうですか？この赤城への愛が溢れそうになっていますか？ねえ？
3.japaneseTL: This is my carefully chosen swim wear. What do you think of it, Commander? Does it make you brim with love for me? Does it?

4.chinese: 指挥官，在海里游散了可不好，请紧紧牵住我的手吧～
4.chineseTL: Commander, it would be bad if we get separated at sea, so please hold my hand tightly~
4.japanese: 指揮官様、海ではぐれては大変ですから、赤城の手をしっかり握ってください♡
4.japaneseTL: It would be troublesome if we were to be separated at sea, so please grasp my hand firmly♡

5.chinese: 放心吧，加賀，你是我唯一的亲友，我身边永远都有你的位置
5.chineseTL: Don't worry, Kaga. You are my only close friend, and you will always have a place by my side.
5.japanese: 加賀、安心して、私の側にはあなたの居場所がずっとあるのよ
5.japaneseTL: Kaga, rest assured that there's always a place for you by my side.

6.chinese: 等到夜幕降临，就用我和加賀的舰载机为指挥官献上盛大的焰火吧！
6.chineseTL: When the night comes, let me and Kaga use our planes to present Commander with spectacular fireworks!
6.japanese: 夜になりましたら、私と加賀の艦載機で指揮官様のために大いに花火大会を盛り上げて差し上げますわ
6.japaneseTL: When night falls, I and Kaga will use our planes to hold a spectacular fireworks display for you, Commander.

7.chinese: 指挥官，你刚刚在和罗德尼做什么？！
7.chineseTL: Commander, what were you just doing with Rodney?!
7.japanese: 指揮官様？今、あのロドニーという子と何をしていましたの？
7.japaneseTL: Commander? What were you doing with that "Rodney" girl just now?

8.chinese: 指挥官，也来教我游泳吧！嗯？你刚才想说什么？
8.chineseTL: Commander, teach me how to swim as well! Hm? What were you about to say?
8.japanese: 指揮官様？私にも泳ぎ方を教えてくださいませ？はい？今何か言いました？
8.japaneseTL: Commander? Could you please teach me how to swim? Hm? Did you say something just now?

9.chinese: 执行委托的家伙们回来啦？指挥官，你如果去迎接的话赤城也一起去~
9.chineseTL: Are the ones out for commission back? Commander, if you're going to welcome them, Akagi will come along~
9.japanese: 委託に出たオジャマムシが戻ってきましたわ。指揮官様、出迎えるなら、赤城もご一緒しますわ
9.japaneseTL: Those meddling worms who went out on a commission have returned. Commander, if you're going to welcome them back then I will go with you.

1.chinese: 指挥官一定会和我永远在一起的对吧，神明大人？当然，指挥官身边的害虫就由我……呵呵呵……
1.chineseTL: Will Commander be with me forever, o God? Of course, it is up to me that the harmful bugs around Commander are... ahaha...
1.japanese: 指揮官様は赤城と永遠に一緒ですわ…ねぇ、カミとやら？もちろん、害虫はこの赤城が……ふふふ……
1.japaneseTL: I'll stay with you for all eternity, Commander… Right, "God"? Of course, I'll take care of all the pests… (Giggles)

2.chinese: 欢迎回来，指挥官，是要先享用赤城呢，还是先享用赤城呢，或者是……吃掉赤城呢~
2.chineseTL: Welcome back, Commander. Do you want to enjoy Akagi first, take pleasure in Akagi first, or perhaps... eat Akagi?~
2.japanese: おかえり、指揮官様～ご飯とお風呂は…ううん、先にこの赤城を召し上がって♡

3.chinese: 指挥官，新的一年我们也会一直一直在一起呢~ 指挥官，这一批的文
3.chineseTL: Commander, we will always be together this new year as well~
3.japanese: 指揮官様、新しい一年もずっとずっと一緒ですわ～

4.chinese: 件处理好了，还有什么也交给赤城吧，要是累了也要告诉我哦
4.chineseTL: Commander, this batch of documents is taken care of. If there's anything else, leave it to Akagi. Also, tell me if you're tired.
4.japanese: 指揮官様、この書類は全部処理しましたの。ほかに何かあったらこの赤城に任せていいですわ。お疲れでしたら赤城に教えてくださいね♡

5.chinese: 指挥官刚才和那个孩子说话了吧~只是普～通的交流对吧？赤城理解的～不过要是再靠近一公分，赤城可就不知道会发生什么事了呢，呵呵呵……
5.chineseTL: Commander just talked with that child right~ It's just nor~mal conversations, right? Akagi understands~ But if the distance shortens by 1 cm, Akagi cannot tell what could happen, ahaha...
5.japanese: 指揮官様、先にあの娘と言葉を交わしましたわね…ええ、もちろん普通の挨拶だってわかっていますわ～ですが、それ以上お近づきになったら…この赤城、何をしてしまうか分かりませんわ……ふふふ……

6.chinese: 啊啦啦？赤城随时都是准备好的状态哟？呵呵呵……
6.chineseTL: Oh my? Akagi is always ready for it. Ahaha...
6.japanese: ふふふ……赤城、いつでも準備万端ですわ♡

1.chinese: 要再多发些请柬呢，嘻嘻……对于害虫们，这样打扫起来比较有效率吧！
1.chineseTL: We need to send more invites, hehe... When it comes to harmful bugs, it's more effective to clean them up this way!
1.japanese: 招待状はもっと送らないと、うふふ……害虫はいっぺんに駆除したほうが効率的にいいですわ~
1.japaneseTL: I need to send out more invitations… (Giggles) It's more efficient to get rid of pests all at once~

2.chinese: 指挥官，你身上其他女人的香味是哪来的？原来是她吗……嘻嘻……赤城明白了哟！
2.chineseTL: Commander, where does this other woman's scent on you come from? I see, so it's 'her'... hehe... Akagi understand now!
2.japanese: 指揮官様、この「他の女の匂い」はどこからきていますの？あの子ですね……うふふ……赤城は知っていますよ…
2.japaneseTL: Where is this other woman's smell coming from, Commander? I see, so it's her… (Giggles)… Now I know…

3.chinese: 指挥官每时每刻都要和赤城在一起，绝对绝对，不能离开赤城哦
3.chineseTL: Commander has to spend every moment with Akagi. You definitely, definitely cannot leave Akagi!
3.japanese: 指揮官様、ずっとずっとこの赤城の側にいてくださいね。絶対、絶対に、赤城から離れてはいけませんよ…
3.japaneseTL: Please stay with me forever and ever. You cannot under any circumstances whatsoever leave me…

4.chinese: 这个世界上只剩下指挥官和赤城就好了~
4.chineseTL: It would be great if Commander and Akagi were only ones left in this world~
4.japanese: この世界に赤城と指揮官様だけが残っていればいいのに…
4.japaneseTL: It would be so nice if the only people left in this world were me and you, Commander…

5.chinese: 指挥官，不要再做无谓的尝试了，锁链都是赤城特别订制的~
5.chineseTL: Commander, resistance is futile. These chains were all specially ordered by Akagi~
5.japanese: 指揮官様、無駄な抵抗をしなくてもいいですわ。この鎖「も」赤城が特別にお作りしましたものなのですよ~
5.japaneseTL: You don't need to put up any futile resistance, Commander. I specifically made these chains just for you~

6.chinese: 想要彻底占有喜欢的事物，是人的本性啊~哦嗬嗬~
6.chineseTL: Wanting to completely own something you like is only human nature~ Ohoho~
6.japanese: 気に入ったものを完全に支配したいというのは、人間の本性ではありませんこと？うふふ
6.japaneseTL: Isn't it just human nature to want to have total control over the things you like? (Giggles)

7.chinese: 指挥官饿了吗？赤城马上就去做饭~不过，可不要趁机逃跑哟~
7.chineseTL: Are you hungry, Commander? Akagi will go and cook for you right away~ But don't try to take this chance to escape~
7.japanese: 指揮官様、小腹が空きましたか？赤城、すぐ料理をお作りしますね~逃げちゃダメですよ…？
7.japaneseTL: Are you hungry, Commander? I will make some food for you right away~ And don't try to run away…

8.chinese: 指挥官忍不住了吗？嘻嘻，赤城也是哦
8.chineseTL: You can't take it in anymore, Commander? Hehe, Akagi feels the same way.
8.japanese: 指揮官様はもう我慢できなくなりましたの？うふふ、この赤城も…うふふふ
8.japaneseTL: Are you unable to control yourself anymore, Commander? (Giggles)Neither can I… (Giggles)

9.chinese: 只要能和指挥官呆在一起，任务也好委托也好什么都不重要。呐，指挥官一定也是这么想的吧~
9.chineseTL: As long as I can stay with Commander, nothing else is important, whether it be missions or commissions. Right? Commander must also feel the same way~
9.japanese: 指揮官様と一緒にいられるなら、任務なんてどうでもいいですわ~…ねえ、指揮官様もそう思っていますよね…
9.japaneseTL: So long as I can be with you I couldn't care less about the mission~… Isn't that right, Commander…?

10.chinese: 赤城知道指挥官想和赤城永远永远待在一起，不过，赤城不偶尔完成几个任务的话，上面会起疑心的~
10.chineseTL: Akagi knows Commander wants to stay with Akagi forever and ever, but, if Akagi doesn't complete some tasks from time to time, the Admiralty would become suspicious~
10.japanese: 指揮官様も赤城とずっと一緒にいたい…赤城、もちろんわかります～ですが、上の方に疑われないよう、たまには任務も遂行したほうが望ましいですわ
10.japaneseTL: You want to be with me as much as possible… Of course I understand that~ However, I advise you to carry out missions from time to time, so as not to arouse suspicion from your superiors.

11.chinese: 阿啦阿啦，邮件来了。嗯~果然上面的蠢货们什么都没发现呢~
11.chineseTL: Oh my oh my, the mail is here. Hmm~ The idiots at the Admiralty really didn't discover anything at all~
11.japanese: お手紙……うふふ、あの偉い方々は何も気づいていないようで……
11.japaneseTL: There's a letter for you… (Giggles) It seems our superiors haven't noticed a thing…

12.chinese: 指挥官，来尝尝赤城亲手泡的安神茶吧~嗯，里面加了一点会让赤城和指挥官的爱更甜美的佐料~
12.chineseTL: Commander, taste this comfort tea brewed by Akagi herself~ Yes, I put a little bit of special ingredients in there, which would sweeten the love between Akagi and the Commander~
12.japanese: 指揮官様、赤城が淹れたお茶はいかがでしょうか~はい、赤城と指揮官様がもっと愛し合えるようにする「隠し味」、もちろん入れてありますわ
12.japaneseTL: Commander, would you like some tea I brewed~? Yes, of course I've added a "secret ingredient" that will help us love each other more.

13.chinese: 好像有些烦人的妖精回来了，指挥官，赤城先失陪一下~
13.chineseTL: Seems like some annoying spirits are back. Commander, Akagi shall excuse herself for a bit~
13.japanese: オジャマムシが戻ってきたようね…指揮官様、赤城は少々席を外しますわ
13.japaneseTL: It seems those meddling worms are back… Commander, I will be taking my leave for a bit.

14.chinese: 呵呵，指挥官，终于醒了吗？诶？赤城什么也没做哦，只是为了能和指挥官永远在一起，稍微锁住了指挥官而已
14.chineseTL: Hoho, Commander, are you finally awake? Ehh? Akagi didn't do anything. It's just that, in order to stay with the Commander forever, Akagi had slightly chained the Commander up.
14.japanese: うふふ、お目覚めですか？…え？赤城は何もしていませんよ、ただ指揮官様と永遠にいられるよう、この鎖に鍵を付けてみただけですわ
14.japaneseTL: (Giggles) Are you awake? Hm? I wasn't doing anything, I was just putting a lock on this chain so that we can be together forever.
